description.S1: The BOLT-52 is in a locked closet.
description.S2: Find a way inside and retrieve it.

blurb.B1: Huxley's partner had the key to the door, but he was probably killed by raptidons.
blurb.B2: You might find the key on his body, or in a raptidon's stomach.
blurb.B3: You found the key to the closet.
blurb.B4: You can also ask Huxley to open the door from inside, it takes Perception, or Engineering (35), Intimidate (55) or Persuade (55).
blurb.B5: The door will open and Huxley will come outand you'll get Iconoclasts reputation.
blurb.B6: You can ask her for a reward, and obtain some Iconoclast reputation.
blurb.B7: Inside the room, loot Mag-Pick, Ammo and Bit Cartridge and the BOLT-52 Cartridge.

description.S1: Return the BOLT-52 to Sanjar in Stellar Bay.

blurb.B1: Return to Sanjar and tell him you saw the review.
blurb.B2: He will mention he even gave a kidney to the company in order to improve his chances of being promoted.
blurb.B3: You can encourage him for the part he plays now.

dialog.speaker: Huxley (Female)
dialog.utterance: AHH! Whew! Thank you so much! It was getting all stuffy in there and I was getting a mite light-headed and I think maybe I was gonna die.

dialog.speaker: Huxley (Female)
dialog.utterance: But now I'm out HERE! I'm headed back to Amber Heights.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You sure you're okay to travel?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Normally, when you help someone, they give you something for their trouble.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> With the trouble you caused me, you're dying here.

dialog.speaker: Huxley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, sure. I'm a runner. I'm used to getting all dizzy and hey who's your identical, slightly blurry friend?

dialog.speaker: Huxley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Wh- I ain't got nothin' on me! How's about a heaping helping of appreciation and respect?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Surely you have something on you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Put in a good word for me with the Iconoclasts and we'll call it even.

dialog.speaker: Huxley (Female)
dialog.utterance: I gotta pack light if I'm gonna run away from monsters.
